more_content:
Selecting the perfect wedding cake to sweeten your special day is no cake-walk, especially if you’re planning your Key West wedding from outside the Conch Republic. Dietary restrictions can also make ordering a seemingly customary dessert something complicated.

Planning a wedding, birthday, or special occasion? Here we’ve narrowed down reliable, local vendors who know how to bake the perfect cake.

Key West Cakes

(305) 296-4162
1014 White St., #8, Key West
Whether it’s a three-tiered wedding cake or a smaller one for a close-knit gathering, cakes at Key West Cakes are all momentous creations for any occasion. Made on site, the bakery has been named “Best in Weddings” by the renowned wedding planning resource, The Knot. Designs are smart, tasteful and always tasty. 

Cakes by Karol

(305) 393-3020
813 Peacock Plaza, Key West
Customize your wedding cake at this boutique cake shop in New Town. Karol offers an array of buttercream fillings such as Key Lime and piña colada. Gluten-free and vegan options abound! Cakes by Karol has been consistently rated on Wedding Wire and offers free quotes.

Croissants de France

(305) 294-2624
816 Duval St., Key West
Petit fours, dessert buffet or a wedding cake à la française, Croissants de France has the baking skills of the Old World sprinkled with the inspiration of the Conch Republic. Browse the gallery of beach-themed cakes to match your wedding motif!

 

Planning a destination wedding in Key West? Read about trusted, local vendors for your Key West wedding here. Also, check out the Sunset Green as a wedding venue or request a proposal here. Set between 24 North and our sister hotel The Gates Key West, the Sunset Green Event Lawn offers beauty, convenience, and versatility for you and your guests. Whether you're planning a large wedding or an intimate gathering, our Sunset Green Event Lawn offers a vibrant environment and easygoing feel steps from your hotel room.
